name: Flying Fruit Frenzy
description:
FRUIT FLYING FRENZY - a game made in under 48 hours for the first GAME MAKER'S TOOLKIT GAME JAM. (2k17).

It's  a  Short and Sweet shoot em up side scroller with mouse aiming controls where you play as a watermelon shooting oranges out of the sky. 

Please Excuse the Title Screen. and HAVE FUN!! ( It's Fun trust Me )

!!!!!! ATTENTION !!!!!!!!!!

PLEASE read the description for the theme TO SAVE TIME because I do NOT explain many of those mechanics WELL AT ALL in game! SORRY but Have Fun and ENJOY =)

Controls: M Wheel Down for something Cool, Rest are in Game!
